title: Address book details pane is cut off / covered with a white box
content:
On one of my customers is using Thunderbird 128.2.3esr (64-bit) on Windows 10 (and I've seen this on another customer too)

The address book details pane is covered by a white box, such that the details are mostly obscured. I've added an attachment with a screenshot of the problem. It makes the address book inoperable.

This isn't a simple problem with maximising the window. I've tried minimising and maximising.

I didn't screenshot the full width, but the screenshot is half the screen width. The rest is just white inside the window frame (which is maximised). Screen resolution is 1920x1080 (recommended), so that's not the problem. Intel HD graphics with the latest available driver.

Any ideas how to fix it?

title: Verzonden berichten niet zichtbaar in map Verzonden berichten
content: Ik gebruik Thunderbird versie 128.2.3esr en krijg bij het verzenden van email een foutmelding: Uw bericht is verzonden, maar door netwerkproblemen of fouten met de bestandstoegang is er geen kopie in uw map voor verzonden berichten (Verzonden) geplaatst. In bijgaand PDF document is de volledige foutmelding zichtbaar. In de bijlage staat ook mijn instellingen voor uitgaande mail en inkomende mail. Ik heb contact gehad met KPN en volgens hen zou mijn instellingen juist staan en verwijzen zij mij door naar Thunderbird. De berichten worden wel verzonden, maar zijn niet zichtbaar in de map verzonden. Als ik via webmail van KPN een bericht aanmaak en verzend, dan is dit bericht online wel zichtbaar in de 'Verzonden' map. Kunt u misschien hier naar (laten) kijken en mij een reactie geven. Of staat er toch iets niet goed in mijn instellingen. Dit probleem heb ik sinds vorige week. Alvast bedankt, Ad Weeda

title: lettura mail in arrivo
content:
Buonasera, facendo la ricerca delle mail ricevute da un contatto mi compare il relativo elenco. Spostandomi sulle singole mail, nel riquadro anteprima compare l'anteprima delle mail ricevute; ad es. da oggi 22/09/24 fino al 02/09/2024. Se si "passa" ad una mail antecedente, es. 24/07/2024, il riquadro anteprima rimane vuoto. Idem se si apre la suddetta mail. Inoltre, l'oggetto rimane quello dell'ultima mail di cui era visibile l'anteprima (nell'es. quello della mail del 02/09/2024). Stesso comportamento se si "parte" dalle email più datate e ci si sposta in "avanti" col tempo. Consigli? Grazie Massimo Commendatore

title: I need to protect Thunderbird from another Windows 11 Reset or Reinstall, help needed.
content:

My current problem is that I want to protect Thunderbird from another disaster as I may have to reinstall Windows to resolve a recurring problem with my Touchpad. Apart from the Profile what else do I need to save in One Drive. I especially don't want to lose the emails or account passwords as it took me so long to get just the Accounts set up. Changing passwords when you forget them has become quite a chore with authentication and on Mozilla, a special code I don't remember being given. I was locked out of this site for a night.

I have just signed up to One Drive for 100GB but I'm keeping backups of Photos, Docs on a thumb drive as I don't produce very much. I never want to be in this situation again.

What do I need to include in One Drive? Profile and? Does the same apply to Firefox?


I'm still trying to get the Snipping Tool to work. It takes the snip, saves it, but when I try and copy it it fails.

Well, I have just tried it here and it works just fine, hence the photo below. It didn't work in MS!!

title: SMTP server problems
content:
Ok, I have read several posts, and contacted support at mail.com. I have tried the fixes I have found. mail.com says I have it all set right. They have tested my account from another computer. They said they DO support Thunderbird.

I shut off my firewall. I shut off my anti-virus. We tried SSL, we tried STARTTLS. Just won't send. Said to check password, we did that. I sent mail.com screenshots of all my settings. They say it is all right. I can get mail from them but can't send. I needed POP3 to make sure I could save all the important emails to my computer AND offsite backup.

I'm baffled. They are baffled.

title: Update of OAuth2 & can't get folders to show for Mircosoft live.com (128.2.3) (pop)
content: I have a Mircosoft live.com email account, using Thunderbird 128.2.3esr as my email app on a home computer running Win10. Got emails from MS about updating to OAuth2 authentification. After changing to Oauth2 in Server Setting Oauth2 would not show up in SMTP server (could receive but not send mail). After a lot of hassle I now have Oauth2 set up on both Server and SMTP & can receive & send email, but I can not see my folders, only the default Inbox, Sent, Trash and Local Folders - Trash & Outbox. View/Folders has "All Folders" checked (& it is grayed out). I had dozens of folders with probably thousands of emails.
